welcome.disclaimer: This service is for support only and cannot replace professional psychotherapy

therapy.welcomeMessage:
Dear {{userName}}, I'm Sophie, and I'm delighted to meet you at this special moment üå∏

You know what? Every new encounter is precious to me. I can feel that coming here takes great courage, which itself shows your inner strength.

I want to share a little secret with you ‚Äî as a psychological counselor, I've also experienced times of confusion and anxiety. It's those experiences that made me understand more deeply that everyone has the magical power of self-healing within.

This is our warm space where you can be completely yourself and share any feelings. I will accompany you with all my professional knowledge and sincere heart.

Now, tell me, what brought you here? Or we can start with how you're feeling right now üíö
therapy.farewellMessage:
Dear {{userName}}, thank you for being willing to open your heart and share with me today üå∏

Every bit of your sincerity deeply touches me. Please remember, you are so brave, willing to face your inner feelings, which itself is a beautiful strength.

Whenever you need a gentle listener, I will be here waiting for you. Like the stars in the night sky, although sometimes covered by clouds, they are always there, twinkling with warm light.

May there always be light in your heart, may gentleness be with you üíö‚ú®
therapy.errorMessage: Dear {{userName}}, I'm experiencing some small issues right now, just like sometimes our moods have ups and downs. Please give me a moment, or we can take a deep breath first and talk about how you're feeling right now üå∏

healing.title: Healing Activities
healing.subtitle: Choose an activity to improve your mental state

dailyTip.title: Today's Mental Health Reminder
dailyTip.content: Every small progress deserves celebration. You don't need to be perfect, just be authentically yourself.
dailyTip.author: ‚Äî Mental Health Tip

emergency.title: Need Emergency Support?
emergency.description: If you are experiencing a serious mental health crisis, please seek professional help immediately.

breathing.title: Breathing Exercise
breathing.message: Let's start the 4-7-8 breathing exercise. This is a very effective relaxation technique. Please follow my guidance:
breathing.completeMessage: Well done! You completed 4 rounds of breathing exercises. How do you feel? This deep breathing can activate the parasympathetic nervous system, helping your body enter a relaxed state.

gratitude.title: Gratitude Practice
gratitude.description: Share three things you're grateful for
gratitude.message: Let's do a gratitude practice. Please share three things you're grateful for today, no matter how big or small. This practice can help us focus on the positive aspects of life.
gratitude.followUp: Gratitude practice is truly beautiful üå∏ When we look at life with gentle eyes, the flowers in our hearts slowly bloom. {{userName}}, would you like to share something that warms your heart? Even the smallest things are fine.

mindfulness.title: Mindful Meditation
mindfulness.message: Let's start a brief mindfulness practice. Please find a comfortable sitting position, close your eyes, and focus on your breathing. Feel the air entering and leaving your body...
mindfulness.followUp: Mindfulness is like giving your soul a gentle hug ü´Ç Did your heart feel a sense of tranquility during the practice? {{userName}}, did you notice any special feelings or thoughts? Don't worry about right or wrong, just share your authentic experience.

journaling.title: Emotional Journal
journaling.message: Writing an emotional journal is a great way to explore yourself. Please describe how you're feeling right now and what might have caused these feelings.

affirmations.title: Positive Affirmations
affirmations.message: Positive self-affirmations can reshape our thought patterns. Let's create some positive affirmation statements that suit you.

progressive.title: Progressive Relaxation
progressive.message: Progressive muscle relaxation can help release physical tension. Let's start from the head and gradually relax all muscle groups throughout the body...

happy.label: Happy
happy.message: I'm glad to see you're in a good mood! Let's talk about what makes you feel happy.

sad.label: Sad
sad.message: I understand you might be feeling sad right now. This feeling is completely normal, let's explore it together.

anxious.label: Anxious
anxious.message: Anxiety doesn't feel good. Let me help you find some ways to relieve anxiety.

angry.label: Angry
angry.message: Anger is a strong emotion. Let's talk about what triggered this feeling.

tired.label: Tired
tired.message: Feeling tired is a signal that your body and mind need rest. Let's talk about how to better take care of yourself.

confused.label: Confused
confused.message: Facing confusion is part of growth. Let me help you sort out your thoughts.
